name: Millennial Pearl Seahorse
title: Millennial Pearl Seahorse
desc: One of the two sovereigns standing at the apex of the Fontemer Aberrants. Poets and authors view it as a proud and noble creature, thus bestowing it with its high-flown title.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Millennial Pearl Seahorse

skills.name: Swirling School of Fish
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG.If this character has <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fontemer Pearl attached, that <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) +1. (Once per Round)

skills.name: Fontemer Hoarthunder
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, attaches <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fontemer Pearl to this character, and summons 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Resonant Coral Orb.

skills.name: Pearl Armor
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fontemer Pearl to this character.
